title: UP Self- Quarantine App
description: This is Self-Quarantine Application, it is an Initiative of Directorate of Medical and Health Services, Government of Uttar Pradesh for Public. The Self-Quarantine App is aimed at increasing awareness and enable State population to get registered and start Quarantine process to avoid any further spread of the fatal COVID-19 virus. Application captures travel history, symptoms and test results of self-quarantined person. This initiative will help government to track the people who are in Self-Quarantine and help them to keep themselves and other safe from fatal Novel Corona (COVID-19) Virus.
